selectAllDistrictByProvinceid: SELECT districtid, name, type FROM district WHERE provinceid = ?
selectAllWardByDistrictid: SELECT wardid, name, type FROM ward WHERE districtid = ?
selectProvinceByID: SELECT name, type FROM province WHERE provinceid = ?
selectDistrictByID: SELECT name, type FROM district WHERE districtid = ?
selectWardByID: SELECT name, type FROM ward WHERE wardid = ?
updateInfoLocation: UPDATE useraccounts SET ProvinceID = ?, DistrictID =?, WardID = ?, StreetName =? WHERE UserAccountID = ?
updateInfoGeolocation: UPDATE useraccounts SET Longitude = ?, Latitude =? WHERE UserAccountID = ?
